00011 // area.cpp*
00012 #include "light.h"
00013 #include "primitive.h"
00014 // AreaLight Method Definitions
00015 AreaLight::AreaLight(const Transform &light2world,
00016                 const Spectrum &le, int ns,
00017                 const Reference<Shape> &s)
00018         : Light(light2world, ns) {
00019         Lemit = le;
00020         if (s->CanIntersect())
00021                 shape = s;
00022         else {
00023                 // Create _ShapeSet_ for _Shape_
00024                 Reference<Shape> shapeSet = s;
00025                 vector<Reference<Shape> > todo, done;
00026                 todo.push_back(shapeSet);
00027                 while (todo.size()) {
00028                         Reference<Shape> sh = todo.back();
00029                         todo.pop_back();
00030                         if (sh->CanIntersect())
00031                                 done.push_back(sh);
00032                         else
00033                                 sh->Refine(todo);
00034                 }
00035                 if (done.size() == 1) shape = done[0];
00036                 else {
00037                         if (done.size() > 16)
00038                                 Warning("Area light geometry turned into %d shapes; "
00039                                         "may be very inefficient.", (int)done.size());
00040                         shape = new ShapeSet(done, s->ObjectToWorld, s->reverseOrientation);
00041                 }
00042         }
00043         area = shape->Area();
00044 }
00045 Spectrum AreaLight::Sample_L(const Point &p,
00046                 const Normal &n, float u1, float u2,
00047                 Vector *wi, float *pdf,
00048                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00049         Normal ns;
00050         Point ps = shape->Sample(p, u1, u2, &ns);
00051         *wi = Normalize(ps - p);
00052         *pdf = shape->Pdf(p, *wi);
00053         visibility->SetSegment(p, ps);
00054         return L(ps, ns, -*wi);
00055 }
00056 float AreaLight::Pdf(const Point &p, const Normal &N,
00057                 const Vector &wi) const {
00058         return shape->Pdf(p, wi);
00059 }
00060 Spectrum AreaLight::Sample_L(const Point &P,
00061                 float u1, float u2, Vector *wo, float *pdf,
00062                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00063         Normal Ns;
00064         Point Ps = shape->Sample(P, u1, u2, &Ns);
00065         *wo = Normalize(Ps - P);
00066         *pdf = shape->Pdf(P, *wo);
00067         visibility->SetSegment(P, Ps);
00068         return L(Ps, Ns, -*wo);
00069 }
00070 Spectrum AreaLight::Sample_L(const Scene *scene, float u1,
00071                 float u2, float u3, float u4,
00072                 Ray *ray, float *pdf) const {
00073         Normal ns;
00074         ray->o = shape->Sample(u1, u2, &ns);
00075         ray->d = UniformSampleSphere(u3, u4);
00076         if (Dot(ray->d, ns) < 0.) ray->d *= -1;
00077         *pdf = shape->Pdf(ray->o) * INV_TWOPI;
00078         return L(ray->o, ns, ray->d);
00079 }
00080 float AreaLight::Pdf(const Point &P, const Vector &w) const {
00081         return shape->Pdf(P, w);
00082 }
00083 Spectrum AreaLight::Sample_L(const Point &P, Vector *wo,
00084                 VisibilityTester *visibility) const {
00085         Normal Ns;
00086         Point Ps = shape->Sample(P, RandomFloat(), RandomFloat(), &Ns);
00087         *wo = Normalize(Ps - P);
00088         visibility->SetSegment(P, Ps);
00089         float pdf = shape->Pdf(P, *wo);
00090         if (pdf == 0.f) return Spectrum(0.f);
00091         return L(P, Ns, -*wo) / pdf;
00092 }
00093 extern "C" DLLEXPORT Light *CreateAreaLight(const Transform &light2world, const ParamSet &paramSet,
00094                 const Reference<Shape> &shape) {
00095         Spectrum L = paramSet.FindOneSpectrum("L", Spectrum(1.0));
00096         int nSamples = paramSet.FindOneInt("nsamples", 1);
00097         return new AreaLight(light2world, L, nSamples, shape);
00098 }
